flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to walk 630000 steps in a week because 7 x 9000 = <<7*9000=630000>>630000
He has 585100 steps to walk on Friday and Saturday because 630000 - 9400 - 9100 - 8300 - 9200 - 8900 = <<630000-9400-9100-8300-9200-8900=585100>>585100
He needs to walk an average of 292550 on Friday and Saturday because 585100 / 2 = <<585100/2=292550>>292550
#### 292550

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63000, not 630000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
